item.title: Senate holds "vote-a-rama" on Trump's "big, beautiful bill"
item.description: After debate on President Trump's massive tax bill stretched into early Monday, the Senate began a "vote-a-rama" on the "big, beautiful bill."

item.title: From rivers to college campuses, how these everyday heroes show up
item.description: This edition of "Dear David" shares the stories of Ed Bieber, a diver who recovered phones after a tragic accident, and two Louisiana students who sup...

item.title: Boulder attack suspect faces murder charges after victim dies
item.description: The suspect in the June 1 attack on a march for Israeli hostages in Boulder, Colorado, will be charged with murder after one of the victims died.

item.title: Government contractor charged with driving circles on National Mall
item.description: Prosecutors allege the June 21 incident caused approximately $10,000 in damage.

item.title: Best debt relief companies, plus advice borrowers need to know now
item.description: These debt relief companies could help you slash your debt, but there are a few things to know before signing up.
